text: was a Japanese fashion designer. He was known for his technology-inspired clothing designs and fragrances. His best known product was L'eau d'Issey. Miyake was born in Hiroshima, Japan. Issey Miyake died on 5 August 2022 from liver cancer in Tokyo, Japan at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Japanese businesspeople Category:Japanese fashion designers Category:People from Hiroshima
title: Issey Miyake
